headline: Securities Fraud Lawsuits and Firewall Cycle Disclosures Might Change The Case For Investing In Fortinet (FTNT)
summary: In November 2025, multiple law firms announced shareholder class action lawsuits against Fortinet, Inc. alleging securities fraud related to the company's disclosures about the FortiGate firewall refresh cycle, claiming investors were misled on its profitability and timing. This development comes soon after Fortinet and Crime Stoppers International launched a global Cybercrime Bounty program to incentivize community reporting and disrupt cybercriminal activity, highlighting how the company...
